name: Two-To-One
overview: In Two-to-One, the player controls a magic wand which has to find its way through 20 mazes. The goal is to collect clocks, tied to a time bomb, within the time limit. However, the main challenge is avoiding to ram against obstacles. The wand can be turned in all directions and when playing in two-player-mode, each player controls one end of the wand. Published as Zip to Win in Italy in both Special Program n.71 (dicembre 1990) and in Hit Parade C64 n.53 (Febbraio 1991).
